Kirsten Gillibrand , who was present for the eye opening, said: It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving. Doctors have also helped Gabrielle Giffords sit up and dangle her legs from her bed. She's able to open her right eye, even though it's bandaged. executive chairman, ''a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said. ''We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries. The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's historic two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. ''You know, I love Eminem but... On Jan. 10, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer sent a companywide e-mail to the effect that Bob Muglia, president of the company's Server and Tools Business, would depart his post this summer. While Windows and Office are household words, our Server and Tools Business has quietly and steadily grown to be the unquestioned leader in server computing, Steve Ballmer wrote.
